Package com.hexaware.controller

Class ReservationService

java.lang.Object
com.hexaware.controller.ReservationService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IReservationService
public class ReservationService extends Object implements IReservationService
This class implements the IReservationService interface and provides methods for reservation-related operations.

    • createReservation

      public void createReservation(List<Vehicle> availableVehicles, int vehicleId, String username, LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate)
      Creates a reservation based on the specified parameters.
      Specified by:
      createReservation in interface IReservationService
      Parameters:
      availableVehicles - The list of available vehicles.
      vehicleId - The ID of the selected vehicle.
      username - The username of the customer making the reservation.
      startDate - The start date of the reservation.
      endDate - The end date of the reservation.

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • cancelReservation

      public void cancelReservation(int reservationId) throws SQLException, DatabaseConnectionException, ReservationException
      Cancels a reservation based on the given reservation ID.
      Specified by:
      cancelReservation in interface IReservationService
      Parameters:
      reservationId - The ID of the reservation to be cancelled.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a SQL exception occurs while accessing the database.
      DatabaseConnectionException - If a database connection exception occurs.
      ReservationException - If an error occurs while cancelling the reservation.
